data.value: A parent item with a tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH may not contain a child item.

If net weight is populated on both parent and child items, then net weight of the parent shall be greater than or equal to the sum of the net weight of all the children except when special item code = "DYNAMIC_ASSORTMENT".
If grossWeight and netWeight are provided on the same record, grossWeight must be greater than or equal to netWeight
Sum of quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem shall equal totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem except when special item code = 'dynamic_assortment'.
Attribute dataRecipient is required to be populated in a Catalogue Item Notification message.
Gross Weight (tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero when Shipping Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true'.
isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be true for at least one GTIN within a hierarchical configuration.
minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than or equal to minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival.

Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) is not used. For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, this attribute is required for all items on the lowest level of the hierarchy for Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) <gpcCategoryCode gpcCategoryName>.
If dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ADR' and dangerousGoodsPackingGroup is not empty then dangerousGoodsPackingGroup must equal ('NA','I', 'II' or 'III').
Dates in <start date attribute> and <end date attribute> are not consistent. The end date <end date value> cannot be earlier than the start date <start date value>.
Values in <minimum attribute> and <maximum attribute> are not consistent. The maximum <maximum value> cannot be smaller than the minimum value <minimum value>.
If the item does not have a child item, the value of isTradeItemABaseUnit must be true.
If the trade item has a child item the value of isTradeItemABaseUnit must be false.
If populated, percentageOfAlcoholByVolume must be greater than or equal to 0.00 and smaller than or equal to 100.00 by definition.

If classOfDangerousGoods is populated and dangerousGoodsRegulationCode equals 'ADR', then classOfDangerousGoods must be one of the following values: '1', '2', '3', '4.1', '4.2', '4.3', '5.1', '5.2', '6.1', '6.2', '7', '8', '9'.

If isTradeItemPackedIrregularly equals ‘FALSE’ and tradeItemCompositionWidth, tradeItemCompositionDepth and quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem are all supplied and tradeItemCompositionWidth/measurementUnitCode and tradeItemCompositionDepth/measurementUnitCode equal ‘EA’ then the product of the three attributes should equal the totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem.
If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then netContent must not be updated.
If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then priceComparisonMeasurement must not be updated.
The value for brandName is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules.
If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' then if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem must not be updated.
childTradeItem GTIN is not allowed to be changed according to GTIN allocation rules
The GTIN cannot be a child of itself.
If TargetMarket/targetMarketCountryCode is equal to ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand)) then the Trade Item Group ID Description must be the same for all GTINs within a Trade Item Group ID
Zero or negative values are not allowed for Packaging Material Composition Quantity where provided
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) starting with '002', '004', '02' are not allowed.
For each GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product

If Irregularly Configured Pallet Indicator (isTradeItemPackedIrregularly) equals 'FALSE', then Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) must be equal to Number of Layers per GTIN (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem) multiplied by Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN (quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer).
If dataCarrierTypeCode is equal to 'EAN_8' then the first six digits of the TradeItem/GTIN shall equal '000000'.
The Target Market Country Code and targetMarketSubdivisionCode when populated, will be consistent for all GTINs within a given hierarchy
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the unit of measure for <attribute> must be specified in degrees Celsius.
If nestingIncrement is populated it must be greater than zero(0).
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Stacking Factor (stackingFactor) must be less than 100.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Stacking Factor for non-GTIN Pallet (logisticsUnitStackingFactor) must be less than 100.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Number of Layers per non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfLayersPerPallet) must be less than 999.
endAvailabilityDateTime shall be later than or equal to today on first population.
discontinuedDateTime must only be updated with documentCommand of 'CORRECT'.
lastChangeDateTime for a trade item must be the same or later than previously sent value
Maximum and minimum humidity shall be expressed as a percentage with a value between '0' and '100'.
There is a limit of 1000 Transactions within 1 Message

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height shall not be 20 percent greater than current version height.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width shall not be 20 percent greater than current version width.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall not be 20 percent greater than current version depth.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/grossWeight shall not be 20 percent greater than current version grossWeight.
Maximum number of iterations of GDSNTradeItemClassificationAttributeType is 25

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, at least one value of Packaging Material Quantity (packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity) must have gram (GRM) or kilogram (KGM) defined as the unit of measure.
The total of values in packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity may not exceed the value in packagingWeight for the same item .

Depth/Length (tradeItemMeasurements/depth) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

Height (tradeItemMeasurements/height) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.

Width (tradeItemMeasurements/width) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used. Use an average value for variable measure items.
Negative values are not allowed for Gross Weight
Zero or negative values are not allowed for Net Weight where Net Weight is Provided

If (Audio Visual Media Product Description Module or Publication Title Rating Module or Audio Visual Media Content Information Module) are used and gpcCategoryCode is equal to '10001137' then audioVisualMediaProductTitle , genreTypeCodeReference , titleRatingCodeReference/Code, titleRatingCodeReference/codeListAgencyCode and gameFormatCode shall be used.
If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden) layerHeight must have the same value as one of the values in width, depth or height of the child item.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals '752' (Sweden) priceBasisQuantity may be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, gram , metre, millimetre, millilitre, litre, square metre, cubic metres,piece.

If targetMarketCountryCode is equal to '752' (Sweden), additionalTradeItemIdentificationValue ('SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', 'DISTRIBUTOR_ASSIGNED') may not have the same value on more than one Trade Item in the same item hierarchy. This rule applies when isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit is equal to 'true'.
If dataCarrierTypeCode equals ('EAN_13', 'UPC_A' or 'UPC_E') then first digit of gtin shall equal '0'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Net Content (netContent) is mandatory on consumer units (Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals to 'true').
If provided, Ordering Lead Time must be greater than zero
If Target Market is '036' (Australia) and taxTypeCode is equal to 'WET' (Wine Equalisation Tax), then percentageOfAlcoholByVolume must be populated

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Number of Units per Layer in a Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer) is used, then Number of Layers per Non-GTIN Pallet (quantityOfLayersPerPallet) must be used.
functionalName may not contain the same text as brandName or descriptiveSizeDimension when IsTradeItemAConsumerUnit is equal to 'true'.
dutyfeeTaxCategoryCode was not used.
If populated, minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfArrival must be greater than zero.
If populated, minimumTradeItemLifespanFromTimeOfProduction must be greater than zero.
Value in grossWeight shall be greater than or equal to value in netContent if this is given as weight. Allowance shall be made for different units of measure.

Value in quantityofNextLowerLevelTradeItem may not exceed 2 when the pallet type is any type of full size pallet and the child item's pallet type is any type of half size pallet. Full size pallets are: ISO 1 Pallet (code 11)
{insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant external code list”.
{insert_attribute_name} contains an invalid value. Used code {insert_incorrect_value} is not included in the relevant GS1 code list”.
If individualUnitMinimum and/or individualUnitMaximum are populated, then isTradeItemABaseUnit must be 'true'
If isTradeItemABaseUnit is equal to 'false', then individualUnitMinimum and/or individualUnitMaximum should never be populated.
Gross Weight (tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) must not be empty and must have a value greater than zero for physical items, i.e., if isTradeItemNonphysical equals 'false' or is not used.
The GTIN's Gross Weight (grossWeight) shall be greater than 96% of the sum of the GTIN's Packaging Weight (packagingWeight) and the Gross Weight (grossWeight) of all its next lower-level child items.
If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.
If tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode is 'PALLET', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can only be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD' or 'PALLET'.
If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PALLET', and the item has a children, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD'.
If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'CASE', and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH' or 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK.'
f tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'CASE' and the item has a children, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'MIXED_MODULE' or 'PALLET'.
If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK' and the item has a parent, then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the parent item can never be 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH'.

If tradeItemUnitDescriptor is 'PACK_OR_INNERPACK', and the item has (a) child(ren), then the tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode of the children can never be 'TRANSPORT_LOAD', 'PALLET', 'MIXED_MODULE', 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'CASE'.
stackingFactor is mandatory for Despatch Units in target market '752' (Sweden).
If populated, one iteration has to be in Swedish for functionalName for TM '752' (Sweden).
For this target market <targetMarketCountryCode>, fileFormatName is mandatory, if uniformResourceIdentifier is used and referencedFileTypeCode equals the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE'.

fileName is mandatory if uniformResourceIdentifier is used and typeOf Information contains the value 'PRODUCT_IMAGE' unless targetMarketCountryCode equals 756 (Switzerland), 276 (Germany), 040 (Austria), 528 (Netherlands).
The dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode must be '9SE' if target market is '752' (Sweden).
lastChangeDateTime for a trade item may not be a date in the future.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) is not in GPC Segment '51000000' (Healthcare) and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) <tradeItem/gtin> must start with '0'.

If isNonGTINLogisticUnitPackedIrregularly is equal to 'false' then value in quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet shall be equal to value in quantityOfLayersPerPallet multiplied by value in quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer
importClassificationTypeCode and importClassificationValue are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.
importClassificationTypeCode and importClassificationValue are used in pairs. If one is populated the other is required.
If quantityOfLayersPerPallet is greater than zero, then quantityOfTradeItemsPerPalletLayer shall be greater than zero for this target market.
If targetMarket equals '840' (US) and growingMethodCode equals 'ORGANIC' then organicClaimAgency and organicTradeItemCode MUST not be empty.
tradeItemDescription is missing. The long description (tradeItemDescription) is mandatory for <<targetMarketCountryCode Name>>.

platformTypeCode is missing. If targetMarketCountryCode does not equal ('036' (Australia) or '554' (New Zealand) or 752 (Sweden)) it is mandatory to specify the pallet type (platformTypeCode) when tradeItemUnitDescriptor is equal to 'PALLET' or ‘MIXED_MODULE’
For target market '250' (France), the country of origin is required for all base units (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'BASE_UNIT_OR_EACH').
When target market code equals '250' (France) the agency maintaining the list of taxes is GS1 France. (dutyFeeTaxAgencyCode = '65').
The free quantity (freeQuantityOfProduct) in a promotional offer shall not exceed the Content net (netContent), when expressed in the same measurementUnitCode.
If the net drained weight is populated (drainedWeight) the net weight must be less than or equal to its net weight (netWeight).

If a trade item has a child trade item (childTradeItem/tradeItemIdentification), the amount associated with this child (childTradeItem/tradeItemIdentification) shall be informed and be greater than 0.

If target Market equals '250' (France)), consumer units for alcoholic beverages (Cls '50202200' , except Brick '10000142') shall have a dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equal to '3001000002541' (Rights on pre-mixes), '3001000002244' (Tax on cider), '3001000002312' (Rights of alcohol) or '3001000002329'.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals '372' (Ireland) and if isTradeItemABaseUnit equals 'true' and ((gpcCategoryCode is in Class ('50202200' or '50211500') and does not equal ('10000142', '10000143', '10000303' or '10000584')) then at least one iteration of AdditionalTradeItemClassification shall have a value with additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode equal to '57'(REV).
IF depositValueEffectiveDate is populated then returnablePackageDepositIdentification or returnablePackageDepositAmount MUST be populated.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Product Variant Start Date/Time (consumerProductVariantStartEffectiveDateTime) is used, then Consumer Product Variant Description (consumerProductVariantDescription) shall be used.
returnableAssetCapacityContent is missing.
discontinuedDateTime shall not be older than effectiveDateTime minus six months.
A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED_BY')
A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('SUBSTITUTED_BY')
A trade item can not be substituted temporarily by itself ('EQUIVALENT')
Dependent Proprietary Trade Item (''DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY') shall not equal TradeItem/tradeItemIdentification.
A trade item can not be the same as the item variant master ('ITEM_VARIANT_MASTER')
A trade item can not be replaced temporarily by itself ('REPLACED').
If the Trade Item is a consumer unit, and the target market country code is '840' (US), the type of bar code [dataCarrierTypeCode] is mandatory
GLN for informationProvider is missing.
The name of the information provider shall be populated.
The startAvailabilityDateTime must be populated for the trade item.
Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) must not be empty.
isTradeItemADespatchUnit must be populated for the trade item.
isTradeItemAnOrderableUnit must be populated for the trade item.
Variable Measure Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) must not be empty.
If the drained weight is populated (drainedWeight) it must be less than or equal to the gross weight (grossWeight).
targetMarket for a child item cannot be more specific than for the parent. Example: If parent item targetmarketCountryCode is equal to '840' then child item cannot have a targetMarketSubdivisonCode.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> then packagingMaterialTypeCode and packagingMaterialCompositionQuantity are used in pairs. I.e. if one is populated the other one must be populated, also.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item height shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item width shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item depth shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item netweight shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item grossWeight shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item packagingWeight shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
The Unit of Measure used for the trade item drainedWeight shall be from same measuring system (e.g. metric) across whole hierarchy.
If fatPercentageInDryMatter is not empty then value must be greater than or equal to 0 and less than or equal to 100.00.
discontinuedDateTime and cancelledDateTime shall not be used simultaneously .
If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_13' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 13 digits and must have a valid check digit.
If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_8' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 8 digits and must have a valid check digit.
If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_14' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 14 digits and must have a valid check digit.
If additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode equals 'GTIN_12' then associated additionalTradeItemIdentification value must have 12 digits and must have a valid check digit.
There must be at most one iteration per language.
There must be at most one iteration per unit.

If Packaging Material Type Code (packagingMaterial/packagingMaterialTypeCode) does not equal ('COMPOSITE', 'METAL_COMPOSITE', 'LAMINATED_CARTON', 'PAPER_PAPERBOARD' or 'OTHER') then CompositeMaterialDetail class must not be used.
Use of temperatureTypeQualifierCode is mandatory in case any other attribute of the TradeItemTemperatureInformation class is not empty.
The maximum length of data type StringAttributeValuePair is 5000 characters.
descriptiveSizeDimension, sizeDimension or sizeCode is missing.
The brandName must not be empty unless the context is 'Pharmaceuticals' or 'Medical Devices'
Product Type Description (functionalName) must not be empty.
Product Type Description (functionalName) must not be empty.
If maximumHumidityPercentage and/or minimumHumidityPercentage are not empty then humidityQualifierCode must not be empty.
If TradeItem/brandOwner/PartyInRole/gln is not empty then brandOwner/PartyRoleCode shall be empty.
If TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/gln is used then TradeItem/informationProviderOfTradeItem/partyRoleCode shall be empty.
If TradeItem/manufacturerOfTradeItem/gln and/or TradeItem/manufacturerOfTradeItem/partyName is used then manufacturerOfTradeItem/partyRoleCode shall be empty.
If cataloguePrice/tradeItemPrice is used then tradeItemPriceTypeCode shall be empty.
If TradeItemPriceInformation/suggestedRetailPrice/tradeItemPrice is used then tradeItemPriceTypeCode shall be empty.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/height must not be less than 80 percent of the current version height.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/width must not be less than 80 percent of the current version width.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall not be less than 80 percent of the current version depth.

If preliminaryItemStatusCode does not equal 'PRELIMINARY' and if the Document Command is equal to 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' then TradeItemMeasurements/grossWeight shall not be less than 80 percent of the current version grossWeight.
partyRoleCode is mandatory in tradeItem/PartyInRole class.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Yield (productYield) is used, then Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) shall be used.
If ProductYieldInformation/productYield is not empty then ProductYieldInformation/productYieldTypeCode must not be empty.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Nonphysical Unit Indicator (isTradeItemNonphysical) equals 'false' or is not used, and Service Indicator (isTradeItemAService) equals 'false' or is not used, and one iteration of Trade Channel Code (tradeItemTradeChannelCode) equals to ('CASH_AND_CARRY', 'CONSIGNMENT', 'CONVENIENCE', 'DRUG_STORE', 'FOOD_SERVICE', 'GROCERY', 'ONLINE' or 'UNSPECIFIED') or Trade Channel Code is not used, then Despatch Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) shall equal 'true' for at least one GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) in the hierarchy.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and for the same Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) the range of dutyFeeTaxEffectiveStartDateTime and dutyFeeTaxEffectiveEndDateTime SHALL NOT overlap.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and gpcCategoryCode equals '10000424' and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'TRUE' then at least one iteration of priceComparisonContentTypeCode shall equal 'PER_KILOGRAM' or 'PER_LITRE'

If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and isTradeItemAConsumerUnit equals 'true' and if priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'PER_PIECE' then priceComparisonMeasurement shall be an Integer
For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if priceComparisonMeasurement is used, then priceComparisonMeasurement shall be greater than 0.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '10', then depth shall be between and including ('800 MMT' or '31.50 IN') and ('1600 MMT' or '63 IN') and width shall be between and including (' '600 MMT' or '23.62 IN') and ('1200 MMT' or '47.24 IN').
When populating netWeight, drainedWeight or grossWeight, the associated measurementUnitCode shall be of the Unit Of Measure Classification 'MASS'

If (TradeItemDimensions/height or TradeItemDimensions/depth or TradeItemDimensions/width ) is not empty, then the unit of measurement shall be expressed in a UOM from the Unit Of Measure Classification 'DIMENSIONS'
Associated measurementUnitCode of priceComparisonMeasurement and/or of one iteration of netContent is/are not from the Unit Of Measure Classification 'VOLUME'.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and dutyFeeTaxTypeCode equals '3001000002282' then dutyFeeTaxRate shall be empty and dutyFeeTaxAmount shall be used.
If targetMarketCountryCode equals '250' (France) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals'PALLET', then TradeItemMeasurements/height shall be less than or equal to '3 MTR'.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and (TradeItemMeasurements/height or TradeItemMeasurements/width or TradeItemMeasurements/depth) is not empty and the associated measurementUnitCode equals 'MTR', then its associated value shall not have more than 3 decimal positions.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and (TradeItemMeasurements/height or TradeItemMeasurements/width or TradeItemMeasurements/depth) is not empty and the associated measurementUnitCode equals ''CMT', then its associated value shall not have more than 1 decimal position.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and (TradeItemMeasurements/height or TradeItemMeasurements/width or TradeItemMeasurements/depth) is not empty and the associated measurementUnitCode equals ''MMT'', then its associated value shall not have a decimal position.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'PER_KILOGRAM' and netWeight is populated, then priceComparisonMeasurement and netWeight shall be equivalent.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and priceComparisonContentTypeCode equals 'DRAINED_WEIGHT' and drainedWeight is populated, then priceComparisonMeasurement and drainedWeight shall be equivalent.
udidFirstPublicationDateTime shall be today's date or in the future.
udidFirstPublicationDateTime shall not be changed once the current populated date has been reached.

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '49', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('610 MMT' or '24.02 IN') and ('1220 MMT' or '48.04 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('508 MMT' or '20 IN') and ('1016 MMT' or '40 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '48', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('610 MMT' or '24.02 IN') and ('1220 MMT' or '48.04 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('1016 MMT' or '40 IN') and ('2032 MMT' or '80 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '47', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('400 MMT' or '15.75 IN') and ('800 MMT' or '31.5 IN'), and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ( '800 MMT' or '31.50 IN) and ('1600 MMT' or '63 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '43', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('1140 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2280 MMT' or '86.62 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('1140 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2280 MMT' or '86.62 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '42', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall bebetween and including ('1100 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2200 MMT' or '86.62 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('1100 MMT' or '43.31 IN') and ('2200 MMT' or '86.62 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '41', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('1067 MMT' or '42.01 IN') and ('2134 MMT' or '84.02 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('1067 MMT' or '42.01 IN') and ('2134 MMT' or '84.02 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '40', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('1016 MMT' or '40 IN') and ('2032 MMT' or '80 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('1219 MMT' or '47.99 IN') and ('2438 MMT' or '95.98 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '35', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('1200 MMT' or '47.24 IN') and ('2400 MMT' or '94.5 IN'), and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('1000 MMT' or '39.37 IN') and ('2000 MMT' or '78.74 IN').

If targetMarketCountryCode equals ('249' (France) or '250' (France)) and tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode equals 'PALLET' and platformTypeCode equals '31', then TradeItemMeasurements/depth shall be between and including ('1000 MMT' or '39.37 IN') and ('2000 MMT' or '78.74 IN') and TradeItemMeasurements/width shall be between and including ('600 MMT' or '23.62 IN') and ('1200 MMT' or '47.34 IN').

The value for level of containment code is not valid; the allowed values are 'CONTAINS', 'FREE_FROM', 'MAY_CONTAIN' for the target market.
The drained weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM' or 'GRM' for the target market.

The quantity contained unit of measurement shall be 'GRM' in case the nutrient type code is 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'FAMSCIS', 'FAPUCIS', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'FIBTG', 'SALTEQ', 'SUGAR-', 'POLYL' or 'STARCH' for the target market.
The value of percentage of daily value intake shall be greater than or equal to 0 (zero).
The percentage of alcohol by volume shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.
The degree of original wort shall have the same value in all levels of this hierarchy for the target market.
An instance of preparation instructions with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out in case preparation state code is filled out with 'PREPARED' and at least one nutrient type code is filled out.

An instance of provenance statement with the language code 'nl' shall be filled out for target market Netherlands in case regulatory product name is filled out and the gpc category code equals 10005786.
You should fill out the field quantity contained because you used the field nutrient type code for this target market.

Daily value intake reference shall be filled out in case the nutrient type code equals 'FAT', 'FASAT', 'ENER-', 'CHOAVL', 'PRO-', 'SUGAR-' or 'SALTEQ' and daily value intake percent is filled out for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FASAT', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAMSCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'FAPUCIS', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'FAT' within the same group, for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'STARCH', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' within the same group, for the target market.
If nutrient type code is filled out with 'POLYL', then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL’ within the same group, for the target market.

If nutrient type code is filled out with 'SUGAR-’, then there shall be another nutrient type code with value 'CHOAVL' for the legally required nutritional table within the same group, for the target market.

The amount of nutrient type code 'NA' multiplied by 2.5 may not deviate more than 10% from the amount of nutrient type code SALTEQ with identical unit of measure in case of consumer units and a measurementPrecisionCode not equal to 'LESS_THAN' for target market Netherlands.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) is in GPC Segment '92000000' (Storage/Haulage Containers), then Packaging Marked Returnable Indicator (isPackagingMarkedReturnable) must not be 'true'.
Is packaging marked returnable shall be populated for the target market in case of packed fresh fruits and vegetables.
Drained weight shall be greater than 0 (zero).
Drained weight shall not be used, if packaging type code is equal to 'NE' (Not packed).
Number of smallest units per package shall be greater than 0 (zero).
The <nutrientTypeCode> nutrient type code used is not allowed in the target market.
The sum of the quantity contained values for nutrient type codes 'FAT', 'PRO-' and 'CHOAVL' exceeds 100 gram.
If preparation state code is used, then regulated product name should be used as well for consumer units.
For batteries the field quantity of batteries built-in shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If quantity of batteries built in is not required, please do not populate.
For batteries the field quantity of batteries included shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not included, please do not populate.
For batteries the field quantity of batteries required shall be greater than 0 (zero) if used. If batteries are not required, please do not populate.
For batteries the field Battery weight shall be greater than 0 (zero), if used.
Battery weight unit of measure shall contain the value 'KGM', 'GRM' or 'MGM'.
For a Nutrient Header class, the Nutrient <nutrientTypeCode> and Measurement Precision Code <measurementPrecisionCode> must be unique.
Only one tradeItem/gtin within a hierarchy can have isTradeItemUDIDILevel set to 'true'.
Only one tradeItem/gtin within a hierarchy can have isTradeItemUnitOfUse set to ‘true’.

If all of following three attributes are provided, then gross weight of a Non-GTIN Logistic Unit (NonGTINLogisticsUnitInformation/grossWeight) must be greater than 96 % of Trade Item’s Gross Weight (tradeItemMeasurements/tradeItemWeight/grossWeight) multiplied by the Quantity Of Trade Items Per Pallet (quantityOfTradeItemsPerPallet).
The attribute additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode with value ‘76’ EU Regulation (MDR/IVDR) Risk class is not repeatable.
The attribute additionalTradeItemClassificationSystemCode with value ‘85’ EU Directive (MDD/AIMDD/IVDD) Risk class is not repeatable.
nutritionalScore shall not be used, if nutritionalProgramCode equals '8' (Nutri-Score) and nutritionalProgramStatusCode equals 'NOT_REGISTERED’.

Invalid measurement unit for alcoholicBeverageSugarContent: <alcoholicBeverageSugarContent/@measurementUnitCode>. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, alcoholicBeverageSugarContent must have 'GL' (gram per litre) as the measurement unit.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feeding Instructions (feedingInstructions) must be supplied in Swedish.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, invalid use of aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode. aDRDangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode has been deprecated. Use Dangerous Goods Limited Quantities Code (dangerousGoodsLimitedQuantitiesCode) instead.
One or both of targetConsumerMinimumUsage or targetConsumerMaximumUsage is missing. You must supply one or both of these attributes if you use targetConsumerUsageTypeCode.

Missing Consumer Sales Condition Code (consumerSalesConditionCode). For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the Consumer Sales Condition Code is required for tobacco products.

tradeItemMarketingMessage is missing. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, it is not permitted to use shortTradeItemMarketingMessage without also using tradeItemMarketingMessage.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, it is not permitted to add or remove values in Allergen Type Code (allergenTypeCode) using a 'CHANGE_BY_REFRESH' Document Command. Changes to allergens require a new GTIN.
packagingRawMaterialCode is missing. When packagingRawMaterialContentPercentage is used, packagingRawMaterialCode must also be used.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, sizeTypeCode or sizeDimension is missing. When one is used, the other must be used.
Invalid meaurement unit for colourTemperature: <colourTemperature/@measurementUnitCode>. colourTemperature must have 'KEL' (Kelvin) as the measurement unit.

Invalid Meaurement unit for lightOutput: <lightOutput/@measurementUnitCode>. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, lightOutput must have 'B60' (Lumens per square metre) or 'LUX' (Lux) as the measurement unit.

Nutrient Basis (nutrientBasisQuantity) and Nutrient Basis Type Code (nutrientBasisQuantityTypeCode) is missing. For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Nutrient Code (nutrientTypeCode) is used then both Nutrient Basis (nutrientBasisQuantity) and Nutrient Basis Type Code (nutrientBasisQuantityTypeCode) must also be used.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feed Composition Statement (feedCompositionStatement) must be supplied in Swedish.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feed Analytical Constituents Statement (feedAnalyticalConstituentsStatement) must be supplied in Swedish.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <'targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, one iteration of Feed Additive Statement (feedAdditiveStatement) must be supplied in Swedish.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and the same Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) cannot be repeated without having a corresponding start date (dutyFeeTaxEffectiveStartDateTime ).

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and the same Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) cannot be repeated without having a corresponding end date (dutyFeeTaxEffectiveEndDateTime) except for the last instance.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Customs Classification Type Code (importClassificationTypeCode) equals 'CUSTOMS_TARIFF_NUMBER' then the corresponding Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) shall have a value 8 to 13 numeric characters long.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Pallet Type Code (platformTypeCode) is used, it is mandatory to provide a valid Number of Layers per GTIN (quantityOfCompleteLayersContainedInATradeItem) for a pallet.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, invalid use of dutyFeeTaxRate. Values cannot differ across the trade item hierarchy when used.
If GTIN for Point of Sale (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyValue) or GTIN for Point of Sale Type Code (gs1TradeItemIdentificationKeyCode) is used, then both shall be used.
When Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'EQUIVALENT', then each iteration with Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) SHALL be unique.
When Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'DEPENDENT_PROPRIETARY', then each iteration with Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) SHALL be unique.
At least one other attribute in Trade Item Temperature Information class SHALL be used when Temperature Activity Code (temperatureQualifierCode) is used.
At least one other attribute in Trade Item Humidity Information class SHALL be used when humidityQualifierCode is used.

If Additional Legal Product Information Type Code (compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformationTypeCode) is used, then you SHALL use Additional Legal Product Information (compulsoryAdditionalLabelInformation).
Catch Country Code (catchCountryCode) may only be used when Fish Production Method Code (productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode) does not equal 'MARINE_FISHERY'.
Catch Country Code (catchCountryCode) may only be used when Catch Area Code (catchAreaCode) <catchAreaCode> is one of the inland water codes (’01’, ‘02’, ’03’, ’04’, ’05’, ’06’, ’07, or ’08’).

If Fish Production Method Code (productionMethodForFishAndSeafoodCode) equals 'INLAND_FISHERY', then Catch Area Code (catchAreaCode) <catchAreaCode> SHALL be one of the inland water codes (’01’, ‘02’, ’03’, ’04’, ’05’, ’06’, ’07, or ’08’).

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, priceComparisonMeasurement SHALL be specified with the following units of measures: kilogram, litre or piece.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, both seasonalAvailabilityEndDateTime and seasonalAvailabilityStartDateTime SHALL be used.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Price Comparison Quantity (priceComparisonMeasurement) is required for food product(s).
For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Trade Item Trade Channel Code (tradeItemTradeChannelCode) SHALL be used.
For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Net Mass of Explosives SHALL be specified with the unit of measure of kilogram (KGM).

For initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode <initialSterilisationPriorToUseCode> and/or manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode <manufacturerSpecifiedAcceptableResterilisationCode> shall not equal NOT_STERILISED and is invalidly used.

additionalConfirmationStatusLongDescription is missing and must be provided containing a descriptive error/warning message when confirmationStatusCode equals 'CIC999' ('Free Form Text to be populated by the Data Recipient').
Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) must not be empty.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product <ChildItem..gtin> End Availability Date/Time (endAvailabiltyDateTime) <ChildItem..endAvailabiltyDateTime> SHALL be equal or after the GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) <gtin> End Availability Date/Time (endAvailabiltyDateTime) <endAvailabiltyDateTime>.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Variable Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) equals 'false', then Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentification/@additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) SHALL NOT equal 'PLU'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Party Role Code (partyInRole/partyRoleCode) equals <TradeItem/PartyInRole/partyRoleCode>, then Party In Role GLN (Global Location Number) (TradeItem/PartyInRole/gln) and Party In Role name (TradeItem/PartyInRole/partyName) shall be used.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) of the Contained Product <ChildItem..gtin> Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) equals 'true', then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) <gtin> Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) shall equal 'true'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Tax Amount (dutyFeeTaxAmount) shall be greater than 0 (zero).

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Despatch Unit Indicator (isTradeItemADespatchUnit) equals 'true', then Packaging Type Code (packagingTypeCode) shall be used.

If Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) equals 'SUBSTITUTED', then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) and Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) shall be different.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true' and Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) equals 'true', then Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) and Non Promotional Trade Item GTIN (nonPromotionalTradeItem/gtin) shall be used.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) is used, then Promotional Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAPromotionalUnit) shall equal 'true'.
genus is missing for this trade item. When species is used, genus must also be used.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Preparation Instructions (preparationInstructions) is used, then Preparation Type Code (preparationTypeCode) must be used.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, and Additional Product Identification Type Code (additionalTradeItemIdentificationTypeCode) equals 'SUPPLIER_ASSIGNED', then the maximum length of Additional Product Identification (additionnalTradeItemIdentification) shall be 35 characters.
packagingClaimTypeCode and packagingClaimElementCode, both should be used if one uses any of them.
cannabinoidMinimumRangeValue and cannabinoidMaximumRangeValue, both should be used if one uses any of them.
minimumTerpeneContent and maximumTerpeneContent, both should be used if one uses any of them.
Code '1' (100% Organic) is not allowed in Organic Level Code (organicTradeItemCode) for Country Of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode Code name>. Please use code '2' (Organic) instead.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK' and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) shall be greater than 1.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', and Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) equals '3001000002312' (Droits d'accises sur les alcools/alcohol tax), then Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) shall be greater than 0 (zero).

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'MIXED_MODULE' and Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) is greater than 1, then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) shall start with '0'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Product (freeQuantityOfQuantity) is used, then Free Quantity Of Product Unit Of Measure (freeQuantityOfProduct@measurementUnitCode) shall be equal to one instance of Net Content Unit Of Measure (netContent@measurementUnitCode).

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) equals 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK', then Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) shall not equal 'true'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Next Lower Level Trade Item (freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) is used, then Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) shall equal 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK', Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) shall be greater than 1 and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) shall equal 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then at least one iteration of Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) shall be one of the VAT tax codes ('S', '1G', '2G', '3G', 'H' or 'E').
Code '1' (100% Organic) is not allowed in Organic Level Code (organicTradeItemCode) for Country Of Sale Code <targetMarketCountryCode Code name>. Please use code '2' (Organic) instead.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK' and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Total Count of All Products (totalQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) shall be greater than 1.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', and Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) equals '3001000002312' (Droits d'accises sur les alcools/alcohol tax), then Alcohol Percentage (percentageOfAlcoholByVolume) shall be greater than 0 (zero).

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'DISPLAY_SHIPPER' or 'MIXED_MODULE' and Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) is greater than 1, then GTIN (Global Trade Item Number) (tradeItem/gtin) shall start with '0'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Product (freeQuantityOfQuantity) is used, then Free Quantity Of Product Unit Of Measure (freeQuantityOfProduct@measurementUnitCode) shall be equal to one instance of Net Content Unit Of Measure (netContent@measurementUnitCode).

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) equals 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK', then Base Unit Indicator (isTradeItemABaseUnit) shall not equal 'true'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Free Quantity Of Next Lower Level Trade Item (freeQuantityOfNextLowerLevelTradeItem) is used, then Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) shall equal 'PACK_OR_INNER_PACK', Number of Different Products (quantityOfChildren) shall be greater than 1 and Promotion Type Code (promotionTypeCode) shall equal 'MULTI_PACK_AND_COMBINATION_PACK'.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then at least one iteration of Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) shall be one of the VAT tax codes ('S', '1G', '2G', '3G', 'H' or 'E').

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', then Number of Units per Layer in a GTIN (quantityOfTradeItemsContainedInACompleteLayer) shall be greater than 0.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Product Hierarchy Level Code (tradeItemUnitDescriptorCode) equals 'PALLET' or 'MIXED_MODULE', Pallet Disposition Code (platformTermsAndConditionsCode) shall be used.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Global Product Category Code (gpcCategoryCode) is in GPC Segment '50000000' (Food/Beverage) and Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', Net Weight (netWeight) shall be used.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Invoice Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAnInvoiceUnit) equals 'true' and Variable Unit indicator (isTradeItemAVariableUnit) equals 'true', Selling Unit Of Measure (sellingUnitOfMeasure) shall be used.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, the Start Availability Date/Time (startAvailabiltyDateTime) <ChildItem..startAvailabiltyDateTime> of the contained product <ChildItem..gtin> shall be before or equal to the Start Availability Date/Time <startAvailabiltyDateTime> of the product.

For Country Of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #n>.

Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #2>.

Referenced GTIN (referencedTradeItem/gtin) <referencedTradeItem/gtin> shall be unique. It shall not be repeated for Referenced GTIN Type Code (referencedTradeItemTypeCode) <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #1> and <referencedTradeItemTypeCode #2>.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name>, if Consumer Unit Indicator (isTradeItemAConsumerUnit) equals 'true', then Tax Type Code (dutyFeeTaxTypeCode) must be used.

For Country of Sale Code (targetMarketCountryCode) <targetMarketCountryCode Country name> and Customs Classification Value (importClassificationValue) <importClassificationValue value>, attribute Regulation Type Code (regulationTypeCode) must equal 'DEFORESTATION_REGULATION' and Regulation Compliance Indicator (isTradeItemRegulationCompliant) must equal 'TRUE' or 'NOT_APPLICABLE' in the same iteration.​
